#id=1
#text=Yesterday I had to go across town to the library to return some books .
#id=2
#text=All my friends were busy and my car was in for repairs , so I had to take the bus .
#id=3
#text=First thing was to see what bus I needed .
#id=4
#text=I went over to my computer and pulled up the bus schedules for my city .
#id=5
#text=I found the nearest bus stop and checked the bus lines that stopped there , then looked for the stop nearest the library .
#id=6
#text=There was a bus that went to both stops , so I would n't have to change buses to get there .
#id=7
#text=Next I found the next time the bus would be at the stop near my house , which was only 15 minutes from now .
#id=8
#text=I grabbed the books and headed out to walk to the bus stop .
#id=9
#text=I got to the stop about 5 minutes early and waited for the bus to arrive .
#text=It was only 2 minutes late , which is n't too bad .
#text=I climbed into the bus , paid the driver and found an empty seat .
#text=It was a pretty nice day , so I just sat there looking out the window until we got to the stop by the library .
#text=I got off the bus and went inside to return my books .
#text=It was a good bus ride , no problems with traffic at all .
